alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Valley; Imperial Valley; Joshua Tree NP East (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 01 at 12:33PM PST until January 02 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MST /11 PM PST/ TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower 30s expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Southeast Yuma County, Gila River Valley and Kofa. In California, Eastern portion of Joshua Tree National Park, Imperial Valley and Chuckwalla Valley. * WHEN...From midnight MST /11 PM PST/ tonight to 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Chuckwalla Valley; Imperial Valley; Joshua Tree NP East
